Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Logan Thomas'], 'Producers': ['Aric Cushing', 'Logan Thomas'], 'Starring': ['Aric Cushing', 'Juliet Landau', 'Dale Dickey'], 'Studio': ['Ascent Releasing Entertainment']}
Review Text: I thought this was a very well directed and suspenseful movie. The acting was good and the locale was a good choice. I wasn't really sure of what was going on until near the end, which was a plus for me.
Review Title: The acting was good and the locale was a good choice
Rating: 4.0
